# uptimekuma_notification_gotify (Resource)

Gotify notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_gotify" "example" {
  name              = "Gotify Notifications"
  is_active         = true
  is_default        = false
  apply_existing    = false
  server_url        = "https://gotify.example.com"
  application_token = "AGe0Ks4WV5fEJkX"
  priority          = 8
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `application_token` (String, Sensitive) Gotify application token
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `server_url` (String, Sensitive) Gotify server URL

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `priority` (Number) Gotify message priority (1-10, default 8)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
